I saw vials for sale from a vender in Qeynos.

-----Original Message-----
From: TRAVISL <TRAVIS@...>
To: 'Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com' <Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, April 30, 1999 10:59 AM
Subject: [Bristlebane_EQ] Re: Pottery?? The unknown art form, hehe


>From: TRAVISL <TRAVIS@...>
>
>Can any of you tell me where to get "vials?"
>
>Are these items that can be made with pottery? Also, concerning pottery,
>have any of you made an actual "profit" off of this skill?
>
>I have heard that we need "vials" for Alchemy (I am a Shaman). But no one
>knows where to get the darn things. If pottery is the secret to that, then
>I guess I should dump those unused points into pottery!
>
>Travis
